story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: 樊师傅
story.p1: Fan Shifu brings the authentic taste of Shaanxi to Singapore, specializing in Mianpi—a beloved local delicacy from northwestern China. We pour our heart and soul into every dish, crafting it with love and tireless effort.
story.p2: Our Mianpi is made fresh daily, steaming the batter to achieve that perfect, chewy texture that dances on your palate. Paired with our secret house-made chili oil and aromatic vinegar, every bite is a harmonious blend of sour, spicy, and savory notes that define Shaanxi cuisine.
story.p3: For Shaanxi locals living in Singapore, we offer a comforting taste of home. For others, we invite you to experience the rich culinary heritage of the region, prepared with the same dedication as if you were a guest in our own home.
